Package DAO

Class ReportDAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • DAO.ReportDAO
  • public class ReportDAO
extends java.lang.Object
    The `ReportDAO` class provides methods to generate various reports from the database.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      static class  ReportDAO.ProductUsageRow
      Represents a row in the product usage report.
      static class  ReportDAO.SalesReportRow
      Represents a row in the sales report.

      Constructs a ReportDAO with the specified database connection.

      Generates a sales report for a specific date range.
      java.math.BigDecimal getTotalRevenue​(java.time.LocalDate startDate, java.time.LocalDate endDate)
      Returns the total revenue generated within a specific date range.

    • Method Detail

      • isDayFinished

        public boolean isDayFinished​(java.time.LocalDate date)
                      throws java.sql.SQLException
        Checks if the day is finished by verifying if the Z report has been run.
        Parameters:
        date - the date to check
        Returns:
        true if the Z report has been run, false otherwise
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - if a database access error occurs

      • ranZ

          throws java.sql.SQLException
        Marks the day as finished by setting the Z report flag to true.
        Parameters:
        date - the date to mark as finished
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - if a database access error occurs
